item.title: Your Anime Rankings - Best of Winter 2026, Feb 12-18
item.content:encoded: <cite>The Invisible Man and His Soon-to-Be Wife</cite> is softly conquering hearts and climbing the rankings. Find out how your favorite shows fared in our weekly user rankings.

item.title: Resident Evil Requiem Game Review
item.content:encoded: It may not be the best of the <i>Resident Evil</i> adventures to come out these last few years, but <i>Requiem</i> probably represents most <i>Resident Evil</i> experience that this new generation has cooked up so far.

item.title: Hell's Paradise Season 2 ‒ Episode 7
item.content:encoded: The action was already pushing this episode for me, but there is also a lot of good story and characterization to be extrapolated from Yamada and Tamiya's fight with Tao Fa.

item.title: Anime Fits Metal Like a Powerglove
item.content:encoded: Since 2005, Powerglove has made the headbanging-est power metal covers of your favorite songs—from video games to anime. To learn more, ANN sat down with the band to talk all things metal, anime, and their upcoming album.

item.content:encoded: Immersive audio drama series debuted on Pocket FM on February 16

item.title: SHIBOYUGI: Playing Death Games to Put Food on the Table ‒ Episode 7
item.content:encoded: I found this to be an emotional and riveting episode of television, just as every chapter of <i>SHIBOYUGI</i> has been thus far. Nonetheless, some cracks, however small they may be, have begun to surface.

item.title: Kodansha Announces TrailRail Puzzle Game for 2026
item.content:encoded: Demo launches on Wednesday

item.title: Agents of the Four Seasons: Dance of Spring Anime's Main Trailer Unveils Theme Songs, March 28 Debut
item.content:encoded: Vocaloid producer, composer Orangestar produces, performs opening song "Petals feat. Kase," ending song "Hana Ikada feat. Kase"

item.title: Miyu Irino Performs Opening Theme for Kusunoki's Garden of Gods Anime
item.content:encoded: Series starring Shōgo Sakata, Shinshū Fuji debuts in April

item.title: Ryōta Suzuki, Tomohiro Ōno Join Cast of Haibara's Teenage New Game+ Anime
item.content:encoded: Anime about man who time travels to 7 years in the past debuts in April

item.title: Hakuōki Ibun: Berezinskii no Majo Spinoff Game's Video Reveals August 27 Release
item.content:encoded: Otomate also reveals 4 new games, with 3 releasing for Switch

item.title: Arc System Works Reveals Donutal Alien Immigration Simulation Game
item.content:encoded: Game debuts on PC via Steam this year

item.title: 20th Seiyū Awards Announces Special Award Winners
item.content:encoded: <cite>The IDOLM@STER</cite> series, Aruno Tahara, Keiko Yokozawa, Shinichirō Kamio, Rei Sakuma, Nami Mizuno honored

item.title: Anime Central 2026 Hosts Yuki Kajiura, FictionJunction
item.content:encoded: ACen runs from May 15-17 in Illinois

item.title: Oshi no Ko Series' 1st Puzzle Game Launches on February 25
item.content:encoded: NHN Corporation developing game in partnership with Kadokawa

item.title: Gintama 'Yoshiwara in Flames' Compilation Film Opens at #2, The Dangers in My Heart Anime at #6
item.content:encoded: 2nd <cite>Gundam Hathaway</cite> film drops to #4, <cite>Evangelion: 3.0+1.0: Thrice Upon A Time</cite> re-release opens at #5, <cite>Milky☆Subway</cite> drops to #8

item.title: The Villager of Level 999 TV Anime's 1st Trailer Reveals More Cast, July Debut
item.content:encoded: Hiroya Egashira, Nobunaga Shimazaki, Manaka Iwami, Aoi Koga, Lynn join anime's cast

item.title: Go! Go! Loser Ranger! Manga to Enter Final Arc on March 18
item.content:encoded: Series takes 3-issue hiatus until then

item.title: Square Enix Manga & Books Licenses Apothecary Diaries: Xiaolan's Story, 8 More Titles
item.content:encoded: Also licensed: <cite>Boyish Girlfriend</cite>, <cite>My Ex-Boyfriend Loves Boys' Love Manga</cite>, more

item.title: Konna Ko Iru ka na Children's Anime Shorts Return After 35 Years
item.content:encoded: Anime segment of <cite>Okaasan to Issho</cite> program once aired from 1986 to 1991

item.title: Hulu Adds Medalist Anime Season 2 in U.S.
item.content:encoded: Episode 1 streams on Friday

item.title: Disney+, Hulu to Stream Rooster Fighter Anime on March 15
item.content:encoded: Series debuts on Toonami on March 14, ahead of Japanese release

item.title: Live-Action Sonic the Hedgehog 4 Film Casts Kristen Bell as Amy Rose
item.content:encoded: Jeff Fowler to return to helm film slated for March 2027

item.title: Akane-banashi Anime Holds World Premiere in U.S. in April
item.content:encoded: Anime to premiere on April 1 in NYC, followed by Anime Boston screening on April 4
